t: What is brand loyalty and why is it important? | Amazon Ads
s: 1 second ago - Brand loyalty is when customers continue to purchase from the same brand over and over again, despite competitors offering similar products or services. Not only do customers continue engaging and purchasing from the same brand, but they also associate positive feelings toward that brand.
